title: Nothing That Doesn’t Fit
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Here here, look, when you do this….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>So cute~~~!! Well, Nico is always cute, but when using this filter, Nico is e~~ven cuter~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Fufu, how about this one? Panda Nico-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>A panda.... This.... Works too! Usually you would use a rabbit or a shiba inu. But for this Nico Nii, I might want to use something unusual like a panda!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>An unusual one huh…. Hmm, then what about this? Komodo Dragon!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Wh~~~~y would you switch to reptiles so suddenly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eh, but it’s quite cute, isn't it? If it’s Nico-san, I think any filter would fit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>….Well, there’s nothing that doesn’t fit me. Alright then, You, let’s do a video together! Ready? On one-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Nico Nico Nii-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Too early!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
